hands.name: Full Set Acrylic with Regular Polish
Deluxe Manicure
hands.info: Paraffin wax dip included with manicure

hands.name: Deluxe Manicure with Gel Polish
hands.info: Paraffin wax dip included with gel manicure

feet.name: Basic Pedicure
feet.info: Procedures: Clean cuticle and reshaping nails, foot scrub and exfoliating, then polish.

feet.name: Spa Pedicure
feet.info: Procedures: Clean cuticle and reshaping nails, foot scrub and exfoliating, massage with orange and lime slices, cooling mask applied with warm towel wrap, then finish with polishing.

feet.name: Deluxe Pedicure
feet.info: Procedures: Clean cuticle and reshaping nails, foot scrub and exfoliating, massage with orange and lime slices, cooling mask with warm towel wrap, massage with hot rocks then finish with polishing.

feet.name: Tropical Pedicure
feet.info: Procedures: Clean cuticle and reshaping nails, foot scrub and exfoliating, massage with orange and lime slices, cooling mask with warm towel wrap, massage with hot rocks, feet are then dipped in paraffin wax, then finish with polishing.

misc.name: Design (2 toes or fingers)
misc.info: Prices may change depending on the quantity of nails
